name: Optimum Mens Health
description: Optimum Men's Health is a website I built during a 2-week sprint as my final school project and for a local business owner. It features full CRUD functionality supported by a Django RESTful API that connects seamlessly with my React and TailwindCSS front end.

images.ImageComment: This is the websites home page, on the right is a slide show of images from the business, I coordinated with my friend for the photoshoot.
2nd part of the home page, shows the latest article posted and business contact details.
About Me section that is created for every provider, it is sourced from their profile that the provider can edit at any time.
This is their Primary Care service page.
2nd part of the Primary Care page with a slide show of customer reviews.
This is the Articles home page where the user can filter articles by their tags. Newest articles display at the top of the list.
Viewing an article, the card under the image is also a link that will take the user to the writers 'About Me' page.

This is the Admin dashboard, (Non-admin providers can only see the consultations they are assigned to, they also have various other restrictions) the admin can see all consultations and at a quick glance see the status of the other providers consultations.

name: My Portfolio
description: This is my first project after graduation. I wanted a visually appealing portfolio to showcase my skills & projects and to share with prospective employers. Itâ€™s built with React and TailwindCSS, and to save on hosting costs the project data is currently stored in a JSON file.
